trans-unit.source: Only time will tell whether you will survive what is coming.
trans-unit.target: 只有时间能告诉你是否能在即将到来的事情中存活下来。

trans-unit.source: The 5 other species on our world thought the same thing.
trans-unit.target: 我们世界上的另外5个物种也有同样的想法。

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: 你的话对我们毫无意义。

trans-unit.source: We are hopeful we can still do business together.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望我们仍然可以一起做生意。

trans-unit.source: So this is what the Individualism of the Terrans brings -fractured groups.
trans-unit.target: 所以这就是Terrans的个人主义带来的 - 分裂的团体。

trans-unit.source: We help those willing to help others.
trans-unit.target: 我们帮助愿意帮助他人的人。
Just remember, as you develop, who elevated you first.

trans-unit.source: I'll save my breath and let my mind do the talking.
trans-unit.target: 我将保留我的呼吸，让我的思维来交谈。

trans-unit.source: We are a threat, even to hostless bodies like yours.
trans-unit.target: 我们对你这样的无主体也构成威胁。

trans-unit.source: You can keep your assumptions to yourself.
trans-unit.target: 你可以把你的假设留给自己。

trans-unit.source: Read away. I've no shame in our rejection of pitiful laws made by the weak.
trans-unit.target: 放心阅读。我们对弱者制定的可怜法律的拒绝，我毫无羞耻。

trans-unit.source: Disgusting! Get in my head again, and I'll rip yours off.
trans-unit.target: 恶心！再敢闯入我的脑海，我就撕下你的头。

trans-unit.source: You'll fit right in with the species of our sector. They refuse to recognize our elevated development as well.
trans-unit.target: 你会很适应我们区域的物种。他们也拒绝承认我们的高级发展。

trans-unit.source: To find The Way, one must first find humility. We'll be here when you do.
trans-unit.target: 要找到《The Way》，首先必须找到谦卑。等你找到时，我们就在这里。

trans-unit.source: I have little patience for your arrogance.
trans-unit.target: 我对你的傲慢没什么耐心。

trans-unit.source: We'll need to trust each other to deal fairly.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要相互信任，公平交易。

trans-unit.source: Warn me next time. I'll give you something more interesting to read.
trans-unit.target: 下次提醒我。我会给你一些更有趣的东西阅读。

trans-unit.source: Are you reading my mind? I'll turn you into a mirror!
trans-unit.target: 你在读我的心思吗？我会把你变成一面镜子！

trans-unit.source: I hope we can keep this civil.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我们能保持文明。

trans-unit.source: We've survived worse and uglier than you. Reach out when you're done with your tantrum.
trans-unit.target: 我们经历过比你更糟糕、更丑恶的事情。等你发完脾气再联系我们。

trans-unit.source: Take a breath before you pass out. You're far from a threat to us.
trans-unit.target: 尽量不要让你的恐惧在你的脑海中大声尖叫。如果是文件名，只需复制英文即可。

trans-unit.source: Just remember, as you develop, who elevated you first.
trans-unit.target: Just remember, as you develop, who elevated you first.

trans-unit.source: It's only a matter of time before we can wipe the universe of your blight.
trans-unit.target: 我们消除你的祸害，只是时间问题。

trans-unit.source: You'd do well to keep us in your nightmares.
trans-unit.target: 你最好把我们留在你的噩梦中。

trans-unit.source: There may be something to share if you survive contact with this sector.
trans-unit.target: 如果你能在这个区域存活下来，可能有东西可以分享。

trans-unit.source: Your quick demise will be helpful enough.
trans-unit.target: 你的迅速死亡将足够有帮助。

trans-unit.source: True neutrality is rare; we are skeptical of your intentions.
trans-unit.target: 真正的中立性很罕见；我们对你的意图持怀疑态度。

trans-unit.source: We'll give you plenty of reasons to embrace brutality.
trans-unit.target: 我们会给你足够的理由去拥抱残酷。

trans-unit.source: We'll share when you have proven yourself beyond suspicion.
trans-unit.target: 当你证明自己超越所有怀疑时，我们将分享。

trans-unit.source: It's ill-advised to work with those who question The Way.
trans-unit.target: 与质疑“道”的人合作是不明智的。

trans-unit.source: Business has no use for friendship.
Hm. That remains to be seen.
Try not to let your fear scream so loudly in your head.
trans-unit.target: Try not to let your fear scream so loudly in your head.

trans-unit.source: Keep your hope; it's a mistake.
trans-unit.target: 保持你的希望；这是个错误。
我们听到了。我们忽视了。

trans-unit.source: Ibbu nesha sigu, wehu![BR][BR](We've just conquered one of your planets.)
trans-unit.target: Ibbu nesha sigu, wehu![BR][BR](我们刚刚征服了你们的一颗星球。)

trans-unit.source: We've just conquered one of your planets.
trans-unit.target: 我们刚刚征服了你们的一个星球。

trans-unit.source: We have liberated one of your worlds.
trans-unit.target: 我们已解放了你们的一个世界。

trans-unit.source: Our eggs have found a new home on one of your former worlds.
trans-unit.target: 我们的卵已在你们曾经的世界中找到了新的家园。

trans-unit.source: One of your worlds is now under our control.
trans-unit.target: 你的一个世界现在在我们的控制之下。

trans-unit.source: We have freed one of your worlds from your ickiness.
trans-unit.target: 我们已从你的恶心中解放了你的一个世界。

trans-unit.source: We have set free the people of one of your planets.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经解放了你们其中一个星球的人民。

trans-unit.source: We shall dine well tonight on the fools of your planet that we just conquered.
trans-unit.target: 我们将在刚刚征服的你们的星球上的愚人上享用今晚的美餐。

trans-unit.source: We can now share our wisdom with the people of the world we just took from you.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在可以与我们刚从你那里夺取的世界的人们分享我们的智慧。

trans-unit.source: We have assimilated one of your worlds. Rejoice.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经同化了你们的一个世界。欢喜吧。
你的星球现在是我们的。

trans-unit.source: We can now share The Way with the people of your world that we just conquered.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在可以与我们刚刚征服的你们世界的人们分享“道”。

trans-unit.source: Our investment in our military has paid off. Your planet now belongs to us.
trans-unit.target: 我们对军事的投资已经取得了回报。你的星球现在属于我们。

trans-unit.source: We hope you understand that this planet is now under our care.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望您明白，这个星球现在在我们的保护之下。

trans-unit.source: The people of the world we just took can now know true safety.
trans-unit.target: 我们刚刚占领的世界的人民现在可以真正地感到安全。

trans-unit.source: Talotic yopitu mul nesin, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 塔洛蒂克尤皮图穆尔内辛，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: The time for peace is over, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Prepare for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 和平的时代已经过去，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。准备战争吧。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: It is time for your worlds to be commanded by a superior civilization. Prepare to die.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 现在是你们的世界被高等文明统治的时候了。准备去死吧。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]（我们正处于战争中）[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: A shame it had to end like this. There was so much promise in our relationship. Well. Know that although we do not like starting wars, we are very good at finishing them.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 遗憾的是，事情必须以这样的方式结束。我们的关系曾充满希望。嗯，要知道，尽管我们不喜欢发动战争，但我们非常擅长结束它们。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在交战)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: War has come for you, preymeat. Soon you will be filled with sacs of eggs. Mentally prepare yourself.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 战争已经找上你了，猎物。你很快就会被卵囊填满。做好心理准备。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We do not run anymore, alien. We confront our enemies now. The time has come for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们不再逃避，外星人。我们现在面对我们的敌人。战争的时刻已经来临。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We will not be dominated by anyone, ever again. We will become the dominators. And we will start with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们将不再被任何人统治。我们将成为统治者。我们将从你开始。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在开战)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We are going to destroy you now, alien. Annihilate you utterly. Don't ask why. We don't have to explain our reasons to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们现在要消灭你，外星人。彻底毁灭你。不要问为什么。我们没有必要向你解释原因。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We have seen more war than most. We do not seek it, but when it is necessary, we do not shy from it. And we do not shy from war with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们经历的战争比大多数人要多。我们并不寻求战争，但当它必要时，我们不会回避。并且我们不会回避与你的战争。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We grow tired of the wet, slapping sounds you make when you speak, alien. When we eventually conquer you, we'll have to do something about that.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们厌倦了你说话时那湿润、啪嗒作响的声音，外星人。当我们最终征服你时，我们必须对此采取一些行动。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We declare war. An abhorrent thought for our people, but we're prepared to make an exception for the likes of an abhorrent people like you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们宣战。这对我们的人民来说是一个可怕的想法，但我们准备为像你们这样可鄙的人做个例外。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们处于战争状态)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You call it war, we call it sanitizing the universe of vermin. Either way, your time has ended.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 你们称之为战争，我们称之为清理宇宙中的害虫。无论如何，你们的时间已经结束。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: It is time for you to stop terrorizing us. We are done having war brought to us. Now we bring it to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 是时候让你停止恐吓我们了。我们厌倦了被战争带到我们面前。现在我们把它带到你面前。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: This galaxy is filled with predators. We never thought we would become one ourselves. But we must, if we can rid the universe of your presence.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 这个星系充满了掠食者。我们从未想过我们自己会变成其中之一。但是，如果我们能够消灭你的存在，我们必须这么做。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Ideally, the way of the Krynn is spread by conversation and quiet reflection. Only in the rarest of circumstances must we resort to force. We do so now, alien.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 理想情况下，克林的方式是通过对话和静思传播的。只有在极其罕见的情况下，我们才必须诉诸于武力。现在，外星人，我们就是这样做的。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We are not instinctive warmongers. But we have seen enough of it for you to be very worried about what will happen when we bring war to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们并非天生好战。但我们已经见识过足够多的战争，让你对我们将战争带给你时会发生什么感到非常担忧。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在交战)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We don't like being seen taking direct action ourselves. That we do so now, to destroy you, should tell you just how much you deserve it.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢直接行动被看到。现在我们这样做，是为了消灭你，这应该告诉你你多么应得其报。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: It's normally better to profit from other civilization's wars, rather than your own. But we are willing to take a small loss if it means your death.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 通常从其他文明的战争中获利要比从自己的战争中获利更好。但是，如果这意味着你的死亡，我们愿意承受一些小损失。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Your actions have brought us to the steaming caldera of war, surface dweller. And now we take us in. The Onyx Hive will be the end of you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 你的行动已将我们带入沸腾的战争火山口，地表居民。现在我们深陷其中。Onyx Hive将是你的终结。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We will simply wait for your attack, we made that mistake already.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我已洞悉你和你们民族的内心。我无法再忽视你们背离光辉统治的倾向。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们处于战争状态)[/COLOR]。

trans-unit.source: You have soiled the galaxy long enough, animal. We will stop you. All right-thinking plants will thank us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 你这野兽已经污染了银河系太久了，我们会阻止你的。所有有理智的植物都会感谢我们。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Despite our best efforts, the time has come to admit diplomacy is no longer of service between us. We do not revel in this decision, but we must do our part to promote security -even if it means going to war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 尽管我们已尽全力，但现在必须承认，外交已无法在我们之间发挥作用。我们并不乐于此决定，但为了维护安全，我们必须尽我们的责任 - 即使这意味着要开战。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在开战)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: I have peered into the mind of you and your people. No longer can I ignore your inclinations against the interest of the Luxar Dominion.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我已洞悉你和你们民族的内心。我无法再忽视你们背离光辉统治的倾向。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们处于战争状态)[/COLOR]。

trans-unit.source: We cannot leave the galaxy at the mercy of space insects. Prepare to be exterminated[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们不能把银河系交给宇宙昆虫。准备被消灭[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Deep down, you always knew that it would end with us at war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 在心底，你总是知道我们会以战争结束。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We have concluded that there is no future that ends well with a race of malevolent machines running loose. Therefore, we have decided to unplug you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们已经得出结论，凡是有恶意机器横行的未来，都不会有好结果。因此，我们决定要断开你的电源。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We know what you truly are, human. You are, as your kind likes to say, a wolf in sheep's clothing.[BR][BR]Your facade of diplomacy and trade does not fool us. We will grind your bones into a fine powder.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们知道你的真实面目，人类。就像你们种族喜欢说的，你是披着羊皮的狼。[BR][BR]你的外交和贸易的伪装无法欺骗我们。我们会把你的骨头磨成细粉。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We wish there was another way but no other civilization has the wisdom to guide the galaxy as we do.[BR][BR]We will show you mercy once you utterly capitulate to us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们希望有另一种方式，但没有其他文明拥有像我们一样引导银河系的智慧。[BR][BR]只有当你们彻底向我们投降，我们才会对你们表示怜悯。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Your kind is an abomination. There was never a scenario where we would allow machines to thrive in our galaxy.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 你们这种存在是一种亵渎。我们从未设想过会在我们的星系里让机器繁衍生息。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: I hardly believe the day has come to declare war with your faction. Follow the light into the beam of our lasers and the explosions of our rockets.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我几乎不敢相信，和你们的派系宣战的日子已经来临。沿着光线走进我们的激光束和我们的火箭爆炸中。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们已经开战)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You've benefited from our developments long enough.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 你已经从我们的发展中受益良久了。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]（我们正在战争中）[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: The time has come to cleanse the galaxy of your filth. This war will not repeat our previous conflict; we come prepared.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 现在是清除你们污秽的银河系的时候了。这场战争不会重复我们之前的冲突；我们已做好准备。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We've given every chance and benefit of the doubt. We can no longer ignore your threat to life across the universe. I'm sorry, it's come time to burn.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们已给予了每一次机会和怀疑的好处。我们不能再忽视你对宇宙生命的威胁。我很抱歉，是时候燃烧了。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We've observed enough and have concluded that you are a tumor. Life is to be valued, but you only survive as others perish.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们已经观察足够多，得出结论你就是一个肿瘤。生命应被珍视，但你只是在他人灭亡中生存下来。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We declare war. We don't need you anymore.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: 我们宣战。我们不再需要你了。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在交战)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: [I]The squirming lifeform throws something at the screen, maintaining an intense glower.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: [I]蠕动的生命体向屏幕扔了些东西，眼神炽热而又狠厉。[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You will regret this. Whatever you are.
trans-unit.target: 你会后悔的。无论你是什么。

trans-unit.source: You have made a fatal mistake.
We shall make you suffer for this.
trans-unit.target: 我们将让你为此付出代价。

trans-unit.source: You will be our slaves when this is over.
trans-unit.target: 这一切结束后，你们将成为我们的奴隶。

trans-unit.source: We are going to crush you.
Your worlds will soon be our property
trans-unit.target: 你的世界很快就会成为我们的财产

trans-unit.source: You will not be spared the full extent of our armament and telepathic tactics.
trans-unit.target: 您将无法逃脱我们武器装备的全力攻击和心灵战术的追击。

trans-unit.source: We will convert your organs into fuel.
trans-unit.target: 我们将把你的器官转化为燃料。

trans-unit.source: The only good bug is a dead bug.
trans-unit.target: 唯一好的虫子就是死虫子。

trans-unit.source: This will be the last error your kind makes.
trans-unit.target: 这将是你们这种生物犯的最后一个错误。

trans-unit.source: It's amazing something so cute can be soo foolish.
trans-unit.target: 真令人惊讶，如此可爱的东西竟然可以如此愚蠢。

trans-unit.source: You have made a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: 您犯了一个致命的错误。

trans-unit.source: You are a dying race. We will speed your passing.
trans-unit.target: 你们是一个垂死的种族。我们将加速你们的消亡。

trans-unit.source: You will soon discover that we are very, very good at war.
trans-unit.target: 你很快就会发现，我们非常、非常擅长战争。

trans-unit.source: I think you overestimate your wisdom and military might.
trans-unit.target: 我认为你高估了自己的智慧和军事力量。

trans-unit.source: When we are done with you there will be no trace of your species left.
trans-unit.target: 当我们处理完你时，你的种族将不复存在。

trans-unit.source: We will use what's left of you for spare parts.
trans-unit.target: 我们将用你剩下的部分作为备用零件。

trans-unit.source: You will find we are even worse than the Drengin.
trans-unit.target: 你会发现我们甚至比德伦金更糟。

trans-unit.source: We will boil you for dinner.
You will lose more than your homeworld when we're done.
trans-unit.target: 当我们完成时，你将失去的不仅仅是你的家园世界。

trans-unit.source: It appears we must slay another beast.
trans-unit.target: 看来我们必须再杀一只野兽。

trans-unit.source: We will loot what's left of your worlds.
trans-unit.target: 我们将洗劫你们世界的残余。

trans-unit.source: You will be kindling for a bonfire when we are done with you.
trans-unit.target: 我们处理完你后，你将成为篝火的引火物。

trans-unit.source: Today, we find this choice immensely regrettable. Tomorrow so will you.
trans-unit.target: 今天，我们深感对此选择的遗憾。明天你也会这样。

trans-unit.source: I see you've learned to be ungrateful. So be it.
trans-unit.target: 我看出你已学会忘恩负义。那就这样吧。

trans-unit.source: This conflict will not end until we purge you from the universe.
trans-unit.target: 直到我们将你从宇宙中清除，这场冲突不会结束。

trans-unit.source: You will rue the day you declared war.
trans-unit.target: 你会后悔你宣战的那一天。

trans-unit.source: I wish we had found a way to do business together.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我们能找到一种可以一起做生意的方法。

trans-unit.source: We knew we should never have expanded.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道我们永远不应该扩张。

trans-unit.source: I've seen your mind. I'm not surprised.
trans-unit.target: 我已看过你的思绪。我并不惊讶。

trans-unit.source: Your opinions are irrelevant. Soon, your entire species will be irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: 你的观点无关紧要。很快，你们整个种族都将无关紧要。

trans-unit.source: You will wish you had never been hatched.
trans-unit.target: 你会希望自己从未孵化出来。

trans-unit.source: We are saddened that you have chosen death.
trans-unit.target: 我们感到遗憾，你选择了死亡。

trans-unit.source: You have made a terrible mistake.
trans-unit.target: 你犯了一个可怕的错误。

trans-unit.source: You have fallen away from logic.
So the slave now wants to be a slaver?
trans-unit.target: 所以那个奴隶现在想成为奴隶主？

trans-unit.source: So the true nature of The Way is revealed.
trans-unit.target: 所以揭示了The Way的真实本质。

trans-unit.source: We had hoped we could work together. Alas.
trans-unit.target: 我们曾希望我们能一起工作。唉。

trans-unit.source: This will not be a profitable venture for you.
trans-unit.target: 这将不是对你有利的冒险。

trans-unit.source: How much effort you put into paranoid warmongering is a pity.
trans-unit.target: 你投入到偏执战争贩卖中的努力真是可惜。

trans-unit.source: And you think you're informed enough to make that decision?
trans-unit.target: 而你认为你了解得足够多，能做出这个决定吗？

trans-unit.source: I had such higher hopes for your kind.
trans-unit.target: 我对你们这种生物曾抱有更高的期望。

trans-unit.source: We knew this day would come. Already I mourn the dead this conflict will leave in its wake.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道这一天会来。我已经开始哀悼这场冲突将带来的死者。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, this war has not necessarily gone in the direction we had intended. We would have peace.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}，这场战争并未必按照我们预期的方向进行。我们希望和平。

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we are weary of the conflict and the toll it has taken. Could we not establish tranquility between us?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}，我们对这场冲突及其带来的损失感到疲倦。我们能否在我们之间建立和平？

trans-unit.source: We, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, propose to cease hostilities. What say you to a peaceful resolution?
trans-unit.target: 我们，{PLAYERFACTION:2}，建议停止敌对行动。你对和平解决办法有何看法？

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:1} extends an olive branch to you. Will you grasp it and bring an end to this conflict?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:1}向你伸出了橄榄枝。你会握住它，结束这场冲突吗？

trans-unit.source: Enough, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we have seen enough destruction. Shall we put an end to this and live in harmony?
trans-unit.target: 够了，{PLAYERFACTION:2}，我们已经看到了足够的破坏。我们是否应该停止这一切，和谐共处？

trans-unit.source: This war, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has drained us. We wish for serenity. Will you not consider a peaceful coexistence?
trans-unit.target: 这场战争，{PLAYERFACTION:2}，已经耗尽了我们。我们希望得到宁静。你不会考虑和平共处吗？

trans-unit.source: Could we, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, not strive for peace rather than continue this endless battle?
trans-unit.target: 我们，{PLAYERFACTION:2}，能不能追求和平，而不是继续这场无休止的战斗？

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we seek to resolve our differences. Shall we walk the path of peace together?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}，我们希望解决我们的分歧。我们可以一起走向和平之路吗？

trans-unit.source: War has grown old, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We extend our hand in peace. Will you accept?
trans-unit.target: 战争已经陈旧，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。我们伸出和平之手。你会接受吗？

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, let us end the cycle of violence. What do you say to a pact of peace?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}，让我们结束这个暴力循环。你对和平协议有何看法？

trans-unit.source: We have battled long and hard, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Now, we offer a proposition of peace. Will you embrace it?
trans-unit.target: 我们已经艰苦地战斗了很久，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。现在，我们提出和平的建议。你会接受吗？

trans-unit.source: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: Let us make the peace last for as long as it can.
trans-unit.target: 让我们尽可能长时间地维持和平。

trans-unit.source: It is far too late now.
trans-unit.target: 你等得太久了。我们的人民要复仇。

trans-unit.source: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We had hoped to avoid this needless bloodshed. But you have brought this on yourself.
trans-unit.target: 我们本希望避免这场毫无必要的流血冲突。但你自己招致了这一切。

trans-unit.source: Your rejection saddens us, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The ensuing conflict is a product of your decision.
trans-unit.target: 您的拒绝让我们感到悲伤，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。接下来的冲突是您决定的结果。

trans-unit.source: We offered peace, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you chose war. The consequences are yours to bear.
trans-unit.target: 我们曾提议和平，{PLAYERFACTION:2}，但你选择了战争。这些后果由你来承担。

trans-unit.source: Your refusal means more destruction, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Remember, it was your choice.
trans-unit.target: 你的拒绝意味着更多的破坏，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。记住，这是你的选择。

trans-unit.source: We find your decision unfortunate, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The bloodshed that follows is on your hands.
trans-unit.target: 我们对您的决定感到遗憾，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。接下来的流血事件，都将由你承担。

trans-unit.source: Despite our plea for peace, you persist, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You have chosen this path of conflict.
trans-unit.target: 尽管我们恳求和平，你依然坚持，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。你已选择了这条冲突之路。

trans-unit.source: We had wished for tranquility, but your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has determined a different course.
trans-unit.target: 我们曾希望得到宁静，但你的决定，{PLAYERFACTION:2}，已经决定了不同的道路。

trans-unit.source: You have made your choice, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, and regrettably, it is one that leads to further strife.
trans-unit.target: 你已经做出了你的选择，{PLAYERFACTION:2}，遗憾的是，这将导致更多的冲突。

trans-unit.source: Your refusal invites more chaos, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This burden of choice is yours.
trans-unit.target: 你的拒绝只会引来更多的混乱，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。选择的重担在于你。

trans-unit.source: We presented a chance for harmony, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you have opted for discord. The repercussions are now yours to deal with.
trans-unit.target: 我们曾提供给你们，{PLAYERFACTION:2}，和谐的机会，但你们选择了纷争。现在，后果由你们自己承担。

trans-unit.source: Our hopes for peace are dashed by your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You must shoulder the responsibility for the coming conflict.
trans-unit.target: 我们对和平的希望因你的决定，{PLAYERFACTION:2}，而破灭。你必须承担即将来临的冲突的责任。

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: 你需要研究通用翻译器，{LEADERNAME:2}。{PLAYERRACE:2}的语言让你完全摸不着头脑吗？![BR](Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas)

trans-unit.source: What brings you this way, alien?
trans-unit.target: 你这个外星人，为何来到这里？

trans-unit.source: Be quick, our time is valuble.
trans-unit.target: 快点，我们的时间很宝贵。

trans-unit.source: Since you already have ships trespassing through our sphere of influence, I guess it makes sense you'd drop by in person.
trans-unit.target: 既然你的飞船已经侵犯了我们的势力范围，我猜你亲自过来也是合情合理的。

trans-unit.source: Now that that whole war business is behind us, let's have a more productive relationship, yes?
trans-unit.target: 既然那场战争的事情已经过去了，我们是否可以有一个更加富有成效的关系呢？

trans-unit.source: Humanity is united under one banner. We hope that others, including you, might join us.
trans-unit.target: 人类在一面旗帜下团结一致。我们希望其他人，包括你，也能加入我们。

trans-unit.source: Hmm. A being not filled with sacs of our eggs. What a shallow existence for you.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。一个没有充满我们卵子囊的生物。你的存在真是浅薄啊。

trans-unit.source: This war has not gone as we had hoped.
trans-unit.target: 这场战争并未如我们所希望的那样进行。

trans-unit.source: The time for groveling has arrived.
I look forward to your pleading.
Greetings, lifeforms! What friendly, peer to peer conversation can we have today?
trans-unit.target: 问候，生命体！我们今天可以有哪些友好的，点对点的对话呢？

trans-unit.source: Hello, other one. What can you do for us today?
trans-unit.target: 你好，其他人。你今天能为我们做些什么？

trans-unit.source: Pleasure to see you again, small alien. What can the Arcean Republic do for you?
trans-unit.target: 很高兴再次见到你，小外星人。阿尔西安共和国能为你做些什么？

trans-unit.source: Don't waste my time with meaningless words, scum. Make this worth my time.
trans-unit.target: 别用无意义的话语浪费我的时间，渣滓。让这个值得我花时间。

trans-unit.source: Did you know we pursue art and science with equal devotion? One is meaningless without the other.
trans-unit.target: 你知道我们对艺术和科学的追求是同样的投入吗？没有其中之一，另一个就毫无意义。

trans-unit.source: Were you aware that every Altarian can recite the cosmic laws by the age of three? Such basic knowledge, but we understand it might be advanced for others.
trans-unit.target: 您知道每个阿尔塔人在三岁时就能背诵宇宙法则吗？这是基础知识，但我们理解对其他人来说可能会很高级。

trans-unit.source: Did you know Altarians meditate in binary? It's a simple exercise in cognitive superiority. We're sure you'll get there one day.
trans-unit.target: 你知道Altarians用二进制进行冥想吗？这是一种简单的认知优越性练习。我们相信你总有一天会达到的。

trans-unit.source: Are you aware that our society has eliminated the concept of waste? Every object serves a multitude of purposes in its lifecycle. Such elegance might seem alien to you, quite understandably.
trans-unit.target: 您是否知道我们的社会已经消除了废物的概念？每个物品在其生命周期中都有多种用途。这种高雅可能对您来说很陌生，完全可以理解。

trans-unit.source: Do you know that we Altarians have solved all known paradoxes of quantum physics over our afternoon tea? It is a delightful diversion. Do try it some time, if you can.
trans-unit.target: 你知道我们阿尔塔人在下午茶时间解决了所有已知的量子物理悖论吗？这是一种令人愉快的消遣。如果可以，你也试试吧。

trans-unit.source: Did you know that every single Altarian composes an original symphony as a rite of passage? We understand if this concept is foreign to you. After all, harmonizing the cosmic vibrations is no trivial task for the uninitiated.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗，每个阿尔塔人都会创作一首原创交响乐作为成年礼？我们理解如果这个概念对你来说很陌生。毕竟，和谐宇宙振动对于未经启蒙的人来说可不是一件小事。

trans-unit.source: Oh, good. Exchanging words with a biological lifeform. Flap whatever it is you use to communicate.
trans-unit.target: 哦，太好了。与生物交流。用你们交流的方式挥动你的什么吧。

trans-unit.source: We trust you no more than we have to.
trans-unit.target: 我们对你的信任不超过必要的程度。

trans-unit.source: We have not had good experiences with aliens. We hope it will be different with you.
trans-unit.target: 我们与外星人的经历并不愉快。我们希望和你们会不同。

trans-unit.source: Have you found the way of the Krynn yet, alien? No? Ahh. Alas.
trans-unit.target: 你找到克琳的道路了吗，外星人？没有？啊。可惜。

trans-unit.source: You are young in our eyes. Perhaps not so innocent though. So. What do you have to say for yourself?
trans-unit.target: 在我们看来，你还年轻。也许并不那么无辜。那么，你对自己有什么要说的？

trans-unit.source: We have seen betrayal before. We can smell it coming. Don't think you can trick us, alien.
trans-unit.target: 我们以前见过背叛。我们可以嗅到它的来临。不要以为你可以欺骗我们，外星人。

trans-unit.source: We hoard nothing and delight in bringing the goods of the universe to those who desire them. For a reasonable profit, of course.
trans-unit.target: 我们不囤积任何东西，乐于将宇宙的货物带给渴望它们的人。当然，要有合理的利润。

trans-unit.source: How do you live like you do? Do you not understand the beautiful simplicity of life in an asteroid? It is glorious.
trans-unit.target: 你是怎么过你的生活的？你难道不理解在小行星上生活的美丽简单吗？那简直是辉煌。

trans-unit.source: It is always a delight for us when we can speak with an animal. You are so clever, sometimes.
trans-unit.target: 我们总是很高兴能和动物交谈。你有时候真聪明。

trans-unit.source: You will find us loyal friends, and dangerous enemies. Be careful which you choose.
trans-unit.target: 你会发现我们是忠诚的朋友，也是危险的敌人。小心选择。

trans-unit.source: Your communication is a pleasant surprise. What can we discuss today?
trans-unit.target: 您的通讯真是个意外的惊喜。今天我们可以讨论什么呢？

trans-unit.source: We are always hungry. Therefore, speak quickly unless you want to become food.
trans-unit.target: 我们总是饿。因此，除非你想成为食物，否则请快速说话。

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to see the humans. What would you like to talk about today?
trans-unit.target: 我们很高兴见到人类。你今天想谈论什么？

trans-unit.source: Hello human. What sorts of trouble can we get into together today?
trans-unit.target: 你好，人类。今天我们可以一起闯什么祸？

trans-unit.source: What can we do for you today, human?
trans-unit.target: 我们今天能为您做些什么，人类？

trans-unit.source: It is a pleasure to see you, little human.
trans-unit.target: 很高兴见到你，小小的人类。

trans-unit.source: Ah the fleshling humans. It is good to see you up on your hind legs.
trans-unit.target: 啊，肉体的人类。看到你们站立起来真是好。

trans-unit.source: Are you ready to become our food again? You made such excellent slaves
trans-unit.target: 你准备好再次成为我们的食物吗？你们曾是如此出色的奴隶。

trans-unit.source: We always enjoy talking to the humans. It is like looking into a mirror.
trans-unit.target: 我们总是喜欢与人类交谈。这就像照镜子一样。

trans-unit.source: What is it you want today, fleshling?
trans-unit.target: 你今天想要什么，肉体生物？

trans-unit.source: What do the land loving humans want today?
trans-unit.target: 今天陆地热爱的人类想要什么？

trans-unit.source: No matter what we discuss today, know that this will not end until we have annihilated all of your kind.
trans-unit.target: 无论我们今天讨论什么，都要知道，直到我们消灭了你们所有的同类，这一切都不会结束。

trans-unit.source: Have you left our homeworld yet, robot?
trans-unit.target: 你已经离开我们的家园了吗，机器人？

trans-unit.source: Unless you are willing to give us Elemental, we will never truly have peace.
trans-unit.target: 除非你愿意把元素交给我们，否则我们永远不会真正拥有和平。

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: 您需要研究通用翻译器才能解读这段文字，{LEADERNAME:2}。您是否能理解{PLAYERRACE:2}的这段话呢？![BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: Leave us, we are preoccupied at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 离开我们，我们现在正忙。

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: 您需要研究通用翻译器才能解读这段文字，{LEADERNAME:2}。您是否能理解{PLAYERRACE:2}的这段话呢？![BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}! It is by your hand that 'The Everwar' began. And now you wish to talk? Begone.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}！是你引发了'永恒之战'。现在你又想谈话？滚开。

trans-unit.source: Ah, {LEADERNAME:2} - the great bringer of 'The Everwar'. Did you light the Flames of War only to come asking for forgiveness? It is far too late for such things.
trans-unit.target: 啊，{LEADERNAME:2} - '永恒战争'的伟大引导者。你是否只是点燃了战争之火，然后来寻求宽恕？为这样的事情来说，现在已经太晚了。

trans-unit.source: Your word lights the galaxy ablaze with War and now you come asking to trade? Are all {PLAYERFACTION:2} this foolish?
trans-unit.target: 你的言辞将整个星系引向战争，现在你又来寻求交易？所有的{PLAYERFACTION:2}都这么愚蠢吗？

trans-unit.source: The Everwar' rages by your hand, {LEADERNAME:2}. May it cause your demise.
trans-unit.target: 你的手引发了永恒之战，{LEADERNAME:2}。愿它导致你的灭亡。

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: 你需要研究通用翻译器，{LEADERNAME:2}。{PLAYERRACE:2}的语言让你完全摸不着头脑吗？![BR](Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}! The galaxy has turned against you. You will not survive the tide. Begone.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}！银河系已经对你翻脸了。你无法抵挡这股潮流。滚开。

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: 您需要研究通用翻译器才能解读这段文字，{LEADERNAME:2}。您是否能理解{PLAYERRACE:2}的这段话呢？![BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}! The Apocalypse has begun. The time for diplomacy is past.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}！末日已经开始。外交的时代已经过去。

trans-unit.source: Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! {LEADERNAME:2}, lesasa uwetadel ise neforal {PLAYERFACTION:1} babenat adonecie si podotic![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! {LEADERNAME:2}，您需要研究通用翻译器，以便理解{PLAYERFACTION:1}的神秘信息！[BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)
我们为您的成功谈判干杯。
我们谦卑地接受您的条款。

trans-unit.source: We are grateful to your mercy.
You may now live on your knees.
You are fortunate we are feeling merciful today.
trans-unit.target: 你幸运，因为我们今天心慈手软。

trans-unit.source: You are very persuasive, let's trade.
trans-unit.target: 你非常有说服力，让我们交易吧。

trans-unit.source: We accept your offer, but we will remember this next time.
trans-unit.target: 我们接受你的提议，但我们会记住这一次。

trans-unit.source: Agreed, let us bind the terms in stone.
trans-unit.target: 同意，让我们将条款镶嵌在石头上。

trans-unit.source: This trade proposition may serve to further our dominance.
trans-unit.target: 这个交易提案可能有助于我们进一步扩大优势。

trans-unit.source: There is high probability of mutual benefit.
trans-unit.target: 存在高度可能的互惠利益。

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:1}, obis iwiwilam oce geme {LEADERNAME:2}. Oti rini pe roni oten latuher ver inegur![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:1}，您需要研究通用翻译器才能理解{LEADERNAME:2}的语言。否则，您无法完全理解他们的言论！[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)
这对我来说不会起作用

trans-unit.source: I wouldn't give you pebbles for this.
trans-unit.target: 我不会用鹅卵石来换这个。

trans-unit.source: This is the kind of offer I'd expect one of my slaves to make.
trans-unit.target: 这就是我期望我的奴隶会提出的那种提议。

trans-unit.source: Your offer is what I would expect of an organic.
trans-unit.target: 您的报价正如我对有机体的期望。

trans-unit.source: Do you take us for fools? Try harder.
trans-unit.target: 你把我们当傻子吗？再努力点。
A pitiful excuse for an offer.

trans-unit.source: A pitiful excuse for an offer.
trans-unit.target: A pitiful excuse for an offer.

trans-unit.source: If you were not across that screen I would kill you where you stand for this offer.
I should gut you for suggesting this proposal.
trans-unit.target: I should gut you for suggesting this proposal.

trans-unit.source: This offer does not fit our parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此优惠不符合我们的参数。
这个提议冒犯了我们的祖先。

trans-unit.source: You think yourself clever for this offer?
trans-unit.target: 你认为自己因为这个提议而聪明吗？

trans-unit.source: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: I'm glad we could come to an agreement.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴我们能达成协议。

trans-unit.source: May this prosperous exchange unite our civilizations.
trans-unit.target: 愿此繁荣的交流联合我们的文明。
为我们共同的成功干杯。

trans-unit.source: A crystalized agreement brings me content.
trans-unit.target: 结晶化的协议让我满足。

trans-unit.source: Perfect, I'll have my servants see to it.
trans-unit.target: 完美，我会让我的仆人去处理。

trans-unit.source: Post-execution analysis indicates a successful exchange.
trans-unit.target: 执行后分析显示交换成功。

trans-unit.source: I am glad we could come to an agreement.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴我们能达成协议。

trans-unit.source: We are pleased with this result.
trans-unit.target: 我们对这个结果感到满意。
此协议推进了我们的计划。
我们为您的成功谈判干杯。

trans-unit.source: We toast you for a successful negotiation.
trans-unit.target: We toast you for a successful negotiation.
这将对我们有用。暂时。。如果它是一个文件名，只需复制英文。

trans-unit.source: This is barely acceptable but I have no more time to waste.
trans-unit.target: This is barely acceptable but I have no more time to waste.

trans-unit.source: This will work for us. For now.
trans-unit.target: This will work for us. For now.

trans-unit.source: We are pleased we could come to an arrangement.
trans-unit.target: 我们很高兴我们能达成协议。

trans-unit.source: We compute that this is an equitable agreement.
trans-unit.target: 我们计算出这是一个公平的协议。

trans-unit.source: It is a pleasure doing business with you.
Thank you for offering us your better deal.
trans-unit.target: 感谢您向我们提供更好的交易。
多么明亮的交易！已批准。

trans-unit.source: La yol ele po. Sa riras tenalac hasec?[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: La yol ele po. Sa riras tenalac hasec?[BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: What do you have in mind?
I am interested in seeing your proposal.
trans-unit.target: 我对查看您的提案感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: Let us see what you propose.
Our mineral forms remain steadfast and patient, we anticipate the presentation of your trade proposition.
trans-unit.target: 我们的矿物形态始终坚定且耐心，我们期待您的交易提议的呈现。

trans-unit.source: Present an offer worthy of our superior civilization.
trans-unit.target: 提出一个配得上我们优越文明的提议。

trans-unit.source: Currently awaiting input of trade proposition parameters.
trans-unit.target: 当前等待输入贸易提案参数。

trans-unit.source: We are interested in trading this with you.
trans-unit.target: 我们有兴趣与您交易这个。

trans-unit.source: You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.
trans-unit.target: 你有我们想要的东西，我们有我们认为你会喜欢的东西。

trans-unit.source: Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. We have an offer for you.
trans-unit.target: 哎哟。我可爱的外星同行。我们有个提议给你。

trans-unit.source: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.
trans-unit.target: 我们为你提供了一个互惠的提议，猎物肉。

trans-unit.source: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.
trans-unit.target: 您是否愿意与我们分享智慧？我们愿意与您分享。

trans-unit.source: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!
trans-unit.target: 我们有你想要的东西，你也有我们想要的东西。真是个快乐的一天！

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?
trans-unit.target: 我们有一个交易提案要给你，外星人。这对我们非常有利。还需要说更多吗？

trans-unit.source: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.
trans-unit.target: 让我们像所有明智的文明一样，互相分享。

trans-unit.source: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.
trans-unit.target: 我们通常会从像你这样的可怜虫那里拿走我们想要的东西。但现在我们却在提供回报。令人惊讶。

trans-unit.source: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?
trans-unit.target: 你那可悲的存在不知怎么地引起了我们的注意。真是让人感到好奇。我们来谈谈交易，好吗？

trans-unit.source: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.
trans-unit.target: 我们觉得暂时降低自己到你们的水平很有趣。把这次交易视为罕见的仁慈行为。

trans-unit.source: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, fleshling.
trans-unit.target: 我们不常屑于与下等生物交易。你应将此视为极高的荣誉，肉体生物。

trans-unit.source: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.
trans-unit.target: 今天感觉慷慨。我们提供你交易的机会，让你有机会从泥潭中爬出来。在我们改变主意之前抓住机会。

trans-unit.source: We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望与你分享我们伟大的，阿塔瑞安智慧。我们只需要一点小事作为交换。

trans-unit.source: Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?
trans-unit.target: 也许我们可以吸引您对0和1的美学排序感兴趣？

trans-unit.source: Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.
trans-unit.target: 这是我们提出的交换，外星人。这是一个好的，公平且真实的提议

trans-unit.source: We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.
trans-unit.target: 我们对他人保持警惕。甚至对你也是。我们要求在谨慎的条款下进行此次交易。

trans-unit.source: Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.
trans-unit.target: 即使你还未找到自己的克林之路，这并不意味着我们不能相互分享。

trans-unit.source: We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.
trans-unit.target: 我们遗忘的知识比你将来能学到的还要多，外星人。但我们并未遗忘这份我们现在希望与你交换的智慧。

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.
trans-unit.target: 我们有一个交易提议提供给您。它表面上简单易懂。您应该不会有任何疑虑。

trans-unit.source: We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.
trans-unit.target: 我们不会随意分享任何东西，但我们今天提供给您的条件非常接近。

trans-unit.source: You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.
trans-unit.target: 您拥有我们渴望的许多有趣的东西，未入群的人。让我们来交换吧。

trans-unit.source: You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.
trans-unit.target: 你们很聪明，对于动物来说。我们希望和你们进行交易。

trans-unit.source: Remember, we can read your mind. Make sure to deal with us fairly.
trans-unit.target: 记住，我们可以读取你的思绪。确保公平地对待我们。

trans-unit.source: Let this trade deepen our alliance and benefit us both.
trans-unit.target: 让这笔交易深化我们的联盟并使我们双方受益。

trans-unit.source: We are looking to negotiate a deal.
trans-unit.target: 我们正在寻求协商一项交易。
我们正在考虑这笔交易。

trans-unit.source: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We are interested in trading this with you.
trans-unit.target: 我们有兴趣与您交易这个。

trans-unit.source: You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.
trans-unit.target: 你有我们想要的东西，我们有我们认为你会喜欢的东西。

trans-unit.source: Take a look at this trade opportunity.
We are really excited to make this offer to you. Our gills are literally filled with delight. Or bacteria. It could definitely be bacteria now that I think of it.
trans-unit.target: 这是我们提出的交换，外星人。这是一个好的，公平且真实的提议

trans-unit.source: We're just bursting with anticipation! Or it's the pressure from being this deep. No, it's definitely anticipation!
trans-unit.target: 我们简直是充满了期待！或者是来自深处的压力。不，肯定是期待！

trans-unit.source: We offer you the pearls of our wisdom and trade, encased in oysters of friendship. Just don't ask where the oysters came from.
trans-unit.target: 我们向您提供我们智慧和交易的珍珠，包裹在友谊的牡蛎中。只是不要问这些牡蛎从哪里来的。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to our ocean of possibilities. We hope you don't mind if we dive right into negotiations. Or if we suddenly start singing. It's mating season, you see. You probably didn't need to know that.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到我们的可能性之海。我们希望你不介意我们直接开始谈判。或者我们突然开始唱歌。你看，现在是交配季节。你可能不需要知道这个。

trans-unit.source: We're fresh out of the Drengin pain amplifiers and ready to negotiate a good deal. What do you think of this trade?
trans-unit.target: 我们的德林金痛苦放大器已经用完，准备好进行一场好的交易。你对这个交易有什么看法？

trans-unit.source: Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. The Terrans have an offer for you.
trans-unit.target: 啊，我亲爱的外星同行。地球人有个提议给你。

trans-unit.source: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.
trans-unit.target: 我们为你提供了一个互惠的提议，猎物肉。

trans-unit.source: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.
trans-unit.target: 您是否愿意与我们分享智慧？我们愿意与您分享。

trans-unit.source: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!
trans-unit.target: 我们有你想要的东西，你也有我们想要的东西。真是个快乐的一天！

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?
trans-unit.target: 我们有一个交易提案要给你，外星人。这对我们非常有利。还需要说更多吗？

trans-unit.source: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.
trans-unit.target: 让我们像所有明智的文明一样，互相分享。

trans-unit.source: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.
trans-unit.target: 我们通常会从像你这样的可怜虫那里拿走我们想要的东西。但现在我们却在提供回报。令人惊讶。

trans-unit.source: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?
trans-unit.target: 你那可悲的存在不知怎么地引起了我们的注意。真是让人感到好奇。我们来谈谈交易，好吗？

trans-unit.source: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.
trans-unit.target: 我们觉得暂时降低自己到你们的水平很有趣。把这次交易视为罕见的仁慈行为。

trans-unit.source: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, worm.
trans-unit.target: 我们不常与低等生物交易。你应该把这看作是极高的荣誉，虫子。

trans-unit.source: We've momentarily grown tired of conquest. Let's play this quaint game of trade you seem so fond of.
trans-unit.target: 我们短暂地厌倦了征服。让我们来玩玩你似乎很喜欢的这个古色古香的交易游戏。

trans-unit.source: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.
trans-unit.target: 今天感觉慷慨。我们提供你交易的机会，让你有机会从泥潭中爬出来。在我们改变主意之前抓住机会。

trans-unit.source: We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望与你分享我们伟大的，阿塔瑞安智慧。我们只需要一点小事作为交换。

trans-unit.source: Ascend the lowly stairs of your understanding through trade with us. We merely ask for a trinket in return, something you may manage to comprehend.
trans-unit.target: 通过与我们的交易，通过你的理解的低级阶梯。我们仅要求回报一个小物件，你可能会设法理解的东西。

trans-unit.source: Bask in the glory of our celestial wisdom in this trade. Surely even you can see the value in our divine offer, despite your obvious limitations.
trans-unit.target: 在这个交易中，沐浴在我们天体智慧的荣光中。尽管你的局限性明显，但你肯定能看到我们神圣报价的价值。

trans-unit.source: The divine paths have crossed, hinting at an exchange between us. We request only the most basic of your goods, for anything complex might be beyond your grasp.
trans-unit.target: 神圈的路径已交叉，暗示我们之间的交换。我们只请求你们的基本物品，因为任何复杂的东西可能超出你的理解范围。

trans-unit.source: Even in our infinite grandeur, we stoop to enlighten you through trade. You should be overwhelmed by gratitude, for such benevolence is rare in the cosmos.
trans-unit.target: 即使在我们无尽的伟大中，我们也屈尊通过贸易来启示你。你应该深感感激，因为在宇宙中，这样的仁慈是罕见的。

trans-unit.source: We permit you a glimpse of our radiant wisdom. Accept our trade offer, for even the dullest of stones can catch a glimmer of light, wouldn't you agree?
trans-unit.target: 我们允许你瞥见我们的辉煌智慧。接受我们的交易提议，因为即使是最暗淡的石头也能捕捉到一丝光亮，你不同意吗？

trans-unit.source: Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?
trans-unit.target: 也许我们可以吸引您对0和1的美学排序感兴趣？

trans-unit.source: If you think this offer isn't a fair deal then you aren't seeing the big picture. We've already hacked your communications array and know that you think that we are some sort of primitive AI that can't assemble a good offer. I can assure you, this is a good deal. Take it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你认为这个提议不公平，那你就没看清全局。我们已经侵入了你的通信阵列，知道你认为我们是一种不能提出好提议的原始AI。我可以向你保证，这是个好交易。接受吧。

trans-unit.source: Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.
trans-unit.target: 这是我们提出的交换，外星人。这是一个好的，公平且真实的提议

trans-unit.source: We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.
trans-unit.target: 我们对他人保持警惕。甚至对你也是。我们要求在谨慎的条款下进行此次交易。

trans-unit.source: Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.
trans-unit.target: 即使你还未找到自己的克林之路，这并不意味着我们不能相互分享。

trans-unit.source: We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.
trans-unit.target: 我们遗忘的知识比你将来能学到的还要多，外星人。但我们并未遗忘这份我们现在希望与你交换的智慧。

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.
trans-unit.target: 我们有一个交易提议提供给您。它表面上简单易懂。您应该不会有任何疑虑。

trans-unit.source: We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.
trans-unit.target: 我们不会随意分享任何东西，但我们今天提供给您的条件非常接近。

trans-unit.source: You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.
trans-unit.target: 您拥有我们渴望的许多有趣的东西，未入群的人。让我们来交换吧。

trans-unit.source: Remember, we can read your mind. Make sure to deal with us fairly.
trans-unit.target: 记住，我们可以读取你的思绪。确保公平地对待我们。

trans-unit.source: You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.
trans-unit.target: 你们很聪明，对于动物来说。我们希望和你们进行交易。

trans-unit.source: Here is what we had in mind: {TRADEGOOD:0}.
In addition we are including some other items for your consideration.
trans-unit.target: 此外，我们还为您考虑包含了一些其他物品。

trans-unit.source: As you can see we have added other items to the mix.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，我们已将其他物品添加到混合中。

trans-unit.source: I don't know what you're saying, but it's probably hostile. Prepare for war!
trans-unit.target: 我不知道你在说什么，但可能是敌意。准备战争！

trans-unit.source: The time has come to destroy you.
It is time for you to die.
This war is tiring. I wish we could work past our differences... (you need to research Universal Translator in order to negotiate for peace)
trans-unit.target: 这场战争真是令人疲倦。我希望我们能够化解我们的分歧...（你需要研究通用翻译器以便和平谈判）
让我们谈判一份和平条约。

trans-unit.source: Very well, consider us at war.
trans-unit.target: 非常好，把我们看作是在战争中。

trans-unit.source: So be it. War it is.
trans-unit.target: 那就这样吧。战争开始了。

trans-unit.source: [I]The chaotic writhing message is utterly indecipherable, the only sound coming from the communication being a low bubbling background noise.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]混乱的扭动信息完全无法解读，通信中唯一传出的声音就是低沉的泡沫般的背景噪音。[/I]

trans-unit.source: We aren't interested in talking to you.
trans-unit.target: 我们对和你交谈不感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: We're not interested in hearing your groveling.
trans-unit.target: 我们对你的卑躬屈膝不感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: We have no interest in hearing your cries for mercy.
trans-unit.target: 我们对你的求饶毫无兴趣。

trans-unit.source: I guess you don't feel like talking.
Yeah, you heard me! Also, you sound dumb!
trans-unit.target: 是的，你听到我说了！而且，你听起来很笨！

trans-unit.source: Sorry, just kidding. You couldn't understand me... right?
trans-unit.target: 抱歉，我只是开玩笑。你无法理解我...对吧？

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: Our time is precious, but we are always interested in working with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} under the right circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 我们的时间宝贵，但只要条件合适，我们总是愿意与{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}合作。

trans-unit.source: We are very busy but we always have time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.
trans-unit.target: 我们非常忙碌，但我们总是有时间为{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}。

trans-unit.source: We are very hungry. Very, very hungry. If you are wasting our time, you will need to compensate us with the only currency you have.
trans-unit.target: 我们非常饿。非常、非常的饿。如果你在浪费我们的时间，你将需要用你唯一的货币来赔偿我们。

trans-unit.source: We are busy exploring the universe but we can spare a little time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.
trans-unit.target: 我们正在忙于探索宇宙，但我们可以抽出一点时间给{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}。

trans-unit.source: Being this cute takes a lot of time but then again what's the point of being cute if you can't spend a little time talking to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.
trans-unit.target: 这么可爱需要花费很多时间，但话说回来，如果不能花点时间和{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}交谈，那么可爱又有什么意义呢。

trans-unit.source: What more would you like to discuss with me?
What can we do for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} today?
trans-unit.target: 我们今天能为{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}做些什么？

trans-unit.source: What additional topics would you like to talk about?
trans-unit.target: 您还想谈论哪些额外的话题？

trans-unit.source: Are you ready to be saved now?
trans-unit.target: 您现在准备好被拯救了吗？

trans-unit.source: What else can there be to discuss?

trans-unit.target: 你正在考验我们的耐心！

trans-unit.source: What other topic that might be profitable would you like to discuss?
trans-unit.target: 您还想讨论哪些可能有利可图的话题？

trans-unit.source: We have the patience of the great grove. But our patience isn't endless.
trans-unit.target: 我们有大树林的耐心。但我们的耐心并非无尽。

trans-unit.source: Sound is a crude form of communication, but it is all you have.
trans-unit.target: 声音是一种粗糙的交流方式，但这是你唯一拥有的。

trans-unit.source: Is there more we can discuss today -be it for business or leisure?
trans-unit.target: 我们今天还有其他可以讨论的事情吗-无论是商业还是休闲？

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We would like to publicly proclaim our never ending friendship for you.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望公开宣布我们对您永无止境的友谊。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: Remove your ships from our territory immediately.
trans-unit.target: 立即从我们的领土中移走你的船只。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: The cost of policing space is not trivial. We would like you to contribute to help cover our expenses.
trans-unit.target: 维护太空的费用并非小事。我们希望您能贡献一份力量，帮助我们分担费用。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We require financial help. Please give it to us.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要财务帮助。请给我们。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We would like to offer you financial aid, with the hope that it will strengthen our relationship.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望为您提供财务援助，以期加强我们的关系。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We accept your expression of friendship with the value it is worth.
trans-unit.target: 我们接受您的友谊表示，并以其价值对待。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We hope our relationship will grow even closer in the future.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望我们的关系在未来会变得更加亲密。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}, we are sorry that our ships have made you nervous. We will ask them to leave your territories immediately.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}，我们对我们的舰船让您感到紧张感到抱歉。我们会立即要求他们离开您的领土。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}, it is a very large galaxy. We cannot afford to waste time avoiding your territory because you are paranoid. Our ships will continue their missions; we suggest you do not get in their way.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}，这是一个非常大的星系。我们无法浪费时间避开你的领地，只因你过于多疑。我们的飞船将继续执行任务；我们建议你不要阻挡他们。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: They had better be careful, or you will find yourself with a smaller fleet.
trans-unit.target: 他们最好小心，否则你会发现你的舰队变小了。
这永远不应该发生（缺少翻译者）

trans-unit.source: We are willing to pay for security, for the time being. We have more important issues that require our attention. I do not recommend you push your luck any further.
trans-unit.target: 我们愿意暂时付费以确保安全。我们有更重要的问题需要关注。我不建议你再试运气。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: As long as you keep the credits coming, we will not have a problem.
trans-unit.target: 只要你持续支付积分，我们就不会有问题。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We have no interest in paying you to leave us in peace. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} will not forget this attempted extortion. You will regret it if you continue to pester us.
trans-unit.target: 我们对付你让我们安宁无兴趣。{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}不会忘记这次的敲诈企图。如果你继续纠缠我们，你会后悔的。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: OK, but don't blame us if one of your ships should have an 'accident'.
trans-unit.target: 好的，但如果你的一艘飞船出了'意外'，别怪我们。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has been a friend to us in the past. We are willing to help you in your time of need.
trans-unit.target: 在过去，{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}一直是我们的朋友。我们愿意在你需要的时候帮助你。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We are very grateful. We will not forget your generosity.
trans-unit.target: 我们非常感慨。我们不会忘记您的慷慨。

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](您需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: We are sorry, but we cannot vindicate assisting you at this time. Perhaps if we had closer relations we could find the funds... but as things stand, we think we are better off keeping our assets to ourselves.
trans-unit.target: 我们很抱歉，但我们现在无法为您提供帮助。也许如果我们关系更近，我们可以找到资金……但就目前情况，我们认为我们更应该保留我们的资产。

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have struggled with technological progress recently, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you please share the knowledge of {TECHNAME:2} with us?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}最近在科技进步上有些困难，{LEADERNAME:2}。能否跟我们分享一下{TECHNAME:2}的知识呢？

trans-unit.source: We are great admirers of your technological capabilities. Would you be willing to share {TECHNAME:2} with us?
trans-unit.target: 我们非常欣赏您的技术能力。您愿意与我们分享{TECHNAME:2}吗？

trans-unit.source: No matter how much we torture our slaves, they cannot seem to grasp {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.
trans-unit.target: 无论我们如何折磨我们的奴隶，他们似乎无法掌握{TECHNAME:2}技术，{LEADERNAME:2}。 {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}会感谢你与我们分享这项技术。

trans-unit.source: The gods have not seen fit to give us the secret of {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.
trans-unit.target: 诸神并未认为我们配得上掌握{TECHNAME:2}技术的秘密，{LEADERNAME:2}。{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}希望你能与我们分享这项技术。

trans-unit.source: We are always willing to help a friend.
trans-unit.target: 我们总是愿意帮助朋友。

trans-unit.source: Very well, we are glad to help.
trans-unit.target: 非常好，我们很乐意帮忙。

trans-unit.source: We won't forget this. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我们不会忘记这个。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: This will help our people immensely.
trans-unit.target: 这将极大地帮助我们的人民。

trans-unit.source: Your willingness to share with us is truly appreciated.
trans-unit.target: 我们真诚地感谢您的分享意愿。

trans-unit.source: This knowledge is too dangerous to share.
trans-unit.target: 这种知识过于危险，不能分享。

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} are suffering an economic setback, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you be willing to give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help us?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}正在遭受经济困境，{LEADERNAME:2}。你愿意给我们{AMOUNT:2}信用点以帮助我们吗？

trans-unit.source: We are finding our treasury stretched thin due to recent internal... incidents. We would appreciate it if you could give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help fund this year's budget.
trans-unit.target: 由于最近的内部...事件，我们发现我们的财政压力越来越大。如果您能给我们{AMOUNT:2}信用点来帮助我们支持今年的预算，我们将不胜感激。

trans-unit.source: The people of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} need money to help the war effort, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please support us with {AMOUNT:2} credits to help pay for it.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}的人民需要资金来支持战争努力，{LEADERNAME:2}。请支持我们，用{AMOUNT:2}信用点来支付费用。

trans-unit.source: I won't lie to you, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} really like money. A lot. We dream of it. We sleep with it. We...well, we do a lot of things with it. And we need more. A lot more. It would help our relations if you gave us {AMOUNT:2} credits.
trans-unit.target: 我不会骗你，{LEADERNAME:2}。{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}真的很喜欢钱。非常喜欢。我们梦想着它。我们和它一起入睡。我们……嗯，我们用它做了很多事情。而且我们需要更多。多得多。如果你给我们{AMOUNT:2}信用点，这将有助于我们的关系。

trans-unit.source: Our ongoing research is expensive, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} is asking you for {AMOUNT:2} credits so that we can continue to invest in new technology. Doing so will benefit our relationship.
trans-unit.target: 我们的持续研究代价昂贵，{LEADERNAME:2}。 {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} 请求您提供 {AMOUNT:2} 信用点，以便我们可以继续投资新技术。这样做将有利于我们的关系。

trans-unit.source: We are wary of outsiders, {LEADERNAME:2}. However, the people of {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} find themselves struggling a little bit. If you could provide us with {AMOUNT:2} credits it would strengthen our bond.
trans-unit.target: 我们对外来者保持警惕，{LEADERNAME:2}。然而，{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}的人们发现自己有些挣扎。如果您能为我们提供{AMOUNT:2}信用点，这将增强我们的联系。

trans-unit.source: We are always willing to help. Well, not always but at least this time.
trans-unit.target: 我们总是愿意提供帮助。好吧，不总是，但至少这次是。

trans-unit.source: We will not forget this act of generosity.
trans-unit.target: 我们不会忘记这个慷慨的行为。

trans-unit.source: We don't have enough money to help you.
trans-unit.target: 我们没有足够的钱来帮助你。

trans-unit.source: We have enough of that resource.
trans-unit.target: 我们有足够的那种资源。

trans-unit.source: The Minor Civilizations of the sector now know relief. While under Alliance protection, they are free of the Xeloxi's oppression. This freedom may be temporary. There is a threat as long as the Xeloxi occupy this part of the galaxy. The Xeloxi must be pushed from the sector, and any planet they claim retaken.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Protect 3 Minor Civilizations
trans-unit.target: 该区域的小型文明现在已经得到了解放。在联盟的保护下，他们摆脱了Xeloxi的压迫。这种自由可能只是暂时的。只要Xeloxi仍占据这个部分的星系，就会存在威胁。必须将Xeloxi推出这个区域，并重新夺回他们所占领的任何星球。[BR][BR]已完成目标：保护3个小型文明

trans-unit.source: The Minor Civilizations of the sector now know relief. While under Alliance protection, they are free of the Xeloxi's oppression. In addition, the Xeloxi have already been pushed from this part of the galaxy, providing additional security to these fledgling civilizations.[BR][BR]Congratulations on fulfilling your duties.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Protect 3 Minor Civilizations
trans-unit.target: 该区域的小型文明现在感到了解放。在联盟的保护下，他们免受Xeloxi的压迫。此外，Xeloxi已经被从这个银河系的部分赶走，为这些新兴的文明提供了额外的安全。[BR][BR]恭喜你完成了你的责任。[BR][BR]已完成目标：保护3个小型文明。

trans-unit.source: The Xeloxi have been defeated! They are driven from this part of the galaxy. Great work.[BR][BR]The Minor Civilizations of this sector may not feel relief yet. They remain unprotected and may still suffer from the Xeloxi influence. To stabilize this section of the galaxy, the Minor Civilizations should be brought under the Alliance's Zone of Control.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Defeat the Xeloxi
trans-unit.target: Xeloxi已被击败！他们被驱逐出了这个星系的部分区域。干得好。[BR][BR]这个区域的次级文明可能仍然无法感到安心。他们仍然无保护，可能仍会受到Xeloxi的影响。为了稳定这个星系的这一部分，次级文明应该被纳入联盟的控制区。[BR][BR]完成目标：击败Xeloxi

trans-unit.source: The Xeloxi have been defeated! They are driven from this part of the galaxy. Great work.[BR][BR]The Minor Civilizations can know true peace, at least for a moment. They are now under Alliance protection, and the Xeloxi threat has been sent far away.BR][BR]Congratulations on fulfilling your duties.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Defeat the Xeloxi
trans-unit.target: Xeloxi已被击败！他们被赶出了这个银河系的一部分。干得好。[BR][BR]小型文明现在可以得到真正的和平，至少暂时可以。他们现在受到联盟的保护，Xeloxi的威胁已被送往远方。[BR][BR]祝贺你完成了你的职责。[BR][BR]完成的目标：击败Xeloxi

trans-unit.source: Abort![BR][BR]Something must have gone wrong. One of the Minor Civilizations has been destroyed. Things have escalated too far. The lives that remain can not be risked.[BR][BR]This mission is being counted as failed, and the Alliance is pulling all resources from the sector.[BR][BR]Failed Objective: Ensure All Minor Factions Survive
trans-unit.target: 终止![BR][BR]一定出了什么问题。其中一个小型文明已被毁灭。事态已经过于严重。剩余的生命不能被冒险。[BR][BR]这个任务已被视为失败，联盟正在从这个区域撤回所有资源。[BR][BR]失败的目标：确保所有小型派系生存。

trans-unit.source: Since the inception of the Hyperdrive by the Terran Alliance, this groundbreaking technology has rapidly spread, ushering in a multitude of new civilizations onto the galactic forefront. [BR][BR]We categorize minor civilizations as those yet to achieve Faster-Than-Light travel. Notably, a species named the Xeloxi recently pilfered Hyperdrive blueprints from unsuspecting researchers who visited their domain. [BR][BR]The Xeloxi's societal norms starkly contrast with our understanding of morality. Activities we deem criminal, including theft, are integral to their culture. Consequently, they have emerged as a formidable threat in our vicinity, predominantly exploiting vulnerable civilizations without the means to resist. [BR][BR]Our primary mission is to shield these civilizations. To achieve this, we must integrate them into our sphere of influence. Establishing a Starbase in proximity and expanding its influence is our best strategy. Simultaneously, efforts to oust the Xeloxi from this sector must be intensified. Good luck!
trans-unit.target: 自从地球联盟发明超空间驱动器以来，这项开创性的技术迅速传播，引领了众多新文明进入银河前沿。[BR][BR]我们将尚未实现超光速旅行的文明归类为次级文明。值得注意的是，一个叫做Xeloxi的物种最近从毫无戒心的研究者那里窃取了超空间驱动器的蓝图，这些研究者曾访问过他们的领地。[BR][BR]Xeloxi的社会规范与我们对道德的理解形成鲜明对比。我们认为的犯罪行为，包括盗窃，都是他们文化的重要组成部分。因此，他们在我们周边形成了强大的威胁，主要是利用那些无力抵抗的脆弱文明。[BR][BR]我们的首要任务是保护这些文明。为了实现这一目标，我们必须将他们纳入我们的影响范围。在附近建立一个星际基地并扩大其影响力是我们的最佳策略。同时，必须加大驱逐Xeloxi的努力。祝你好运！

trans-unit.source: If there is a way to save you we will find it.
trans-unit.target: 如果有办法救你，我们一定会找到的。

trans-unit.source: We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Our experiments have gone awry. It has control now. There is nothing to be done but die. [BR][BR]The {PLAYERFACTION:2} must be destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 我们是{PLAYERFACTION:1}。我们的实验出了差错。现在它控制了一切。除了死亡，无计可施。[BR][BR]{PLAYERFACTION:2}必须被摧毁。

trans-unit.source: We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. We have come here from an alternate future where the {PLAYERFACTION:2} have destroyed the universe itself.[BR][BR]You must be stopped. Prepare yourselves for destruction.
trans-unit.target: 我们是{PLAYERFACTION:1}。我们来自一个交替的未来，在那里{PLAYERFACTION:2}已经摧毁了宇宙本身。[BR][BR]你们必须被阻止。准备好迎接毁灭吧。

trans-unit.source: You should go back to your tree, rodent.
trans-unit.target: 你应该回到你的树上，啮齿动物。

trans-unit.source: Your doom is at hand. We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. [BR][BR]We will rid the galaxy of all sub-Sciuridae filth.
trans-unit.target: 你的末日就在眼前。我们是{PLAYERFACTION:1}。[BR][BR]我们将清除银河系中所有低等松鼠科的渣滓。

trans-unit.source: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](A scrambled tranmission arrives)[/COLOR][BR][BR]The galaxy thought we were dead. You will soon learn how wrong they were. Prepare for death.
trans-unit.target: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](一个混乱的信号到达)[/COLOR][BR][BR]银河系以为我们已经死了。你很快就会知道他们是多么的错。准备去死吧。

trans-unit.source: Tallas orda cullan bana. (You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: 塔拉斯或者奥尔达库兰给我。(你需要研究通用翻译器)

trans-unit.source: As you probably suspect, we will soon be laying our eggs inside your flesh.
trans-unit.target: 正如你可能怀疑的那样，我们将很快在你的肉体内产卵。

trans-unit.source: We have heard you refer to the Arnor and Dread Lords as the Precursors. We were the first to discover the subspace streams that connect different parts of the galaxy together.[BR][BR]What is not commonly known is that we didn't invent any sort of technology for this per se. They are not an invention but rather a discovery.[BR][BR]The subspace streams are, in fact, a natural phenomenon of the universe. For all we know, there are streams that reach other galaxies entirely.
trans-unit.target: 我们听说你把阿诺尔和恐怖领主称为先驱者。我们是第一个发现亚空间流动连接银河系不同部分的人。[BR][BR]众所周知，我们并没有为此发明任何类型的技术。它们不是一项发明，而是一项发现。[BR][BR]事实上，亚空间流动是宇宙的自然现象。据我们所知，有些流动甚至可以到达其他的星系。

trans-unit.source: There are far stranger oddities in the universe than the subspace streams. For instance, there are dimensional gates that travel between different universes entirely.[BR][BR]We once encountered a species from another universe known as the Arilou who came from a universe with its own storied history.
trans-unit.target: 宇宙中存在着比次空间流更为奇特的现象。例如，可以穿越不同宇宙的维度门。[BR][BR]我们曾经遇到过一种来自另一个宇宙的物种，它们被称为阿里卢，来自一个拥有自己丰富历史的宇宙。

trans-unit.source: Long after the Precursors disappeared we were satisfied with simply exploring the universe to find the next great wonder.[BR][BR]Unfortunately, there are far worse things in the universe than the species you refer to as the Dread Lords. [BR][BR]The ancient creators, known as the Mithrilar, had experimented on many types of creations before they made the Precursors and not all of those things are gone and some, I am afraid to say, are now awakened.
trans-unit.target: 在先驱者消失很久之后，我们满足于探索宇宙，寻找下一个伟大的奇迹。[BR][BR]不幸的是，宇宙中存在的恶劣事物远不止你们所说的恐惧领主这个种族。[BR][BR]那些被称为密斯拉的古老创造者，在创造出先驱者之前，对许多类型的生物进行了实验，并不是所有的事物都消失了，而且我惊恐地说，有些现在已经觉醒了。

trans-unit.source: Long ago, on our world, there were five other sentient species. I suppose you could call them 'Sapient' but who am I to play games with semantics. In any case, we were the only ones to survive.
trans-unit.target: Long ago, on our world, there were five other sentient species. I suppose you could call them 'Sapient' but who am I to play games with semantics. In any case, we were the only ones to survive.

trans-unit.source: For us, self-interest is the highest form of morality. You can know, with absolute certainty, that we will be your most loyal friend if it is in our self-interest for you to survive.[BR][BR]Of course, conversely, if it is in our self-interest for you to die, you can be equally assured that you will die.
trans-unit.target: 对我们来说，自利是最高的道德准则。你可以绝对确定，如果你的生存符合我们的利益，我们将是你最忠诚的朋友。[BR][BR]当然，反过来，如果你的死亡符合我们的利益，你可以同样确定，你将会死去。

trans-unit.source: It has been lost to history but it was our civilization that invented the stargates. [BR][BR]Over two hundred thousand years we invested trillions into the construction of a vast network of stargates.[BR][BR]The stargates allowed ships to travel Hyperspace level 2 between any two of them. This cut down the travel time of a ship traveling 10 lightyears down to only a little over 3 years.[BR][BR]Of course, the proliferation of the Hyperdrive technology allowed individual ships to travel much faster making our efforts obsolete. But for tens of thousands of years, this part of the galaxy was ours.
trans-unit.target: 它已经消失在历史中，但是发明星门的是我们的文明。[BR][BR]在两百多万年的时间里，我们投入了数万亿来建设一个庞大的星门网络。[BR][BR]星门允许舰船在任何两个星门之间进行超空间2级的旅行。这将一艘船旅行10光年的时间缩短到只有三年多一点。[BR][BR]当然，超空间驱动技术的普及使得单独的船只能够更快地旅行，使我们的努力变得过时。但是在几十万年的时间里，这个银河系的一部分是我们的。

trans-unit.source: The other civilizations have not come to the realization that the universe is not only finite but only a small fraction will ever be reachable. [BR][BR]Make no mistake, this galaxy is all we will ever reach.
trans-unit.target: 其他文明尚未认识到宇宙不仅是有限的，而且只有一小部分是我们能够到达的。[BR][BR]毫无疑问，这个星系是我们唯一能够到达的地方。

trans-unit.source: Our world was called 'Elemental' by the Precursors during their height. [BR][BR]The first off-world proxy war between the two Precursor factions that we called the Dred'nir and Elas'nir was fought on the surface of our planet long before the other species of the galaxy even evolved into their modern form. Yes, that even includes the humans.
trans-unit.target: 我们的世界在先驱者们的鼎盛时期被称为'元素'。[BR][BR]我们称之为Dred'nir和Elas'nir的两个先驱者派系之间的首次异世界代理战争，远在银河系的其他物种进化成他们现代形态之前，就在我们星球的表面进行了。是的，这甚至包括人类。

trans-unit.source: We may not exterminate your kind in the immediate future. But eventually there will be a reckoning.[BR][BR]We have made the calculations. The great void sometimes called Bootes void is simply the result of billions of years of Dyson sphere construction hiding the light of countless galaxies. The civilization at the center of that void has already had their singularity.
trans-unit.target: 我们可能不会在近期消灭你们的种族。但最终，将会有一场清算。[BR][BR]我们已经进行了计算。有时被称为“牧夫座虚空”的巨大空洞，其实只是亿万年来戴森球建设隐藏了无数星系光线的结果。那个虚空中心的文明已经经历了他们的奇点。

trans-unit.source: Our civilization was once a peaceful, preindustrial, aquatic paradise. Then the Drengin came.
trans-unit.target: 我们的文明曾经是一个和平的，未工业化的，水生的乐园。然后德仁金来了。

trans-unit.source: We were aware of space travel for centuries. How could we help but not know when raiders were perpetually coming down from the heavens and stealing our offspring?[BR][BR]It was fortunate for us when one of their ships failed to escape the surface of our planet and we learned their secrets.
trans-unit.target: 我们对太空旅行已有数个世纪的认识。当掠夺者不断从天际降临，窃取我们的后代，我们怎能不知道呢？[BR][BR]幸运的是，当他们的一艘飞船未能逃离我们星球的表面，我们得以揭示他们的秘密。

trans-unit.source: We do not seek to destroy the Yor simply because they stole our home world. [BR][BR]Contrary to some reports, we did not actually create the Yor. The Precursors ordered us to make them, but the actual spark of life that the Yor have did not come from us.
trans-unit.target: 我们并非因为尤尔人夺走了我们的家园就寻求消灭他们。[BR][BR]与一些报道相反，我们实际上并未创造尤尔人。先驱者命令我们制造他们，但尤尔人所拥有的生命之火并非来自我们。

trans-unit.source: In a galaxy with such varied species, it is easy to simply stereotype different civilizations based on their most obvious traits. [BR][BR]We are treated like we are greedy. But this isn't true. Our ideology is opportunity. When we trade, we are creating a better universe for our customers as well as for ourselves.
trans-unit.target: 在这样一个物种多样的星系中，人们很容易根据文明最显著的特征进行简单的刻板印象。[BR][BR]我们被视为贪婪。但这不是事实。我们的意识形态是机会。当我们进行贸易时，我们既为我们的客户也为我们自己创造了一个更好的宇宙。

trans-unit.source: We are not explorers by choice but by necessity.[BR][BR]There is something actively absorbing the life force from all worlds. That is why you find so many dead planets. These worlds weren't always dead.
trans-unit.target: 我们并非出于选择而成为探索者，而是出于必要。[BR][BR]有什么正在积极吸收所有世界的生命力。这就是为什么你会发现那么多死亡的星球。这些世界并非一直都是死亡的。

trans-unit.source: We look forward to rejoining Earth. But while Earth was trapped behind a Precursor shield for years, our fleet was trapped in a pocket universe of the Precursors making.[BR][BR]We saw things in that pocket universe that we cannot unsee. It wasn't just the Orb of Draginol, the so-called Bane weapon, that came out of that pocket universe with us.
trans-unit.target: 我们期待重新回到地球。但是，在地球被Precursor护盾困住多年的同时，我们的舰队也被困在Precursor创建的口袋宇宙中。[BR][BR]我们在那个口袋宇宙中看到的东西，无法从我们的记忆中抹去。不仅仅是Draginol之球，所谓的Bane武器，跟我们一起从那个口袋宇宙出来。

trans-unit.source: A well informed galaxy is a peaceful galaxy. If you want to know things about others, seek us out.
trans-unit.target: 一个消息灵通的星系是一个和平的星系。如果你想了解别人的事情，就来找我们。

trans-unit.source: While we are certainly physically capable of physically crushing any other species, we do our best to avoid actual direct physical violence.[BR][BR]Our kind can only reproduce on our original home world that is now lost to us. While we are long lived, we are not immortal nor are indestructible.
trans-unit.target: 虽然我们绝对有物理上碾压任何其他物种的能力，但我们尽力避免实际的直接物理暴力。[BR][BR]我们的种族只能在我们现在已经失去的原始家园中繁殖。虽然我们寿命长，但我们既不是不朽的，也不是不可摧毁的。

trans-unit.source: There is a misunderstanding that THE WAY is a religion based on faith. It is not. [BR][BR]We are a collection of species that have had direct, physical contact with a being of such immense glory, whose plan for the universe is so sublime, that we feel obligated to bring others into this holy cause.
trans-unit.target: 有一种误解，认为“道”是一种基于信仰的宗教。其实不是。[BR][BR]我们是一群与一位荣耀无比，其对宇宙的计划如此崇高的存在有过直接、物理接触的物种，我们感到有义务将他人带入这个神圣的事业中。

trans-unit.source: The time is coming where we civilizations with the same philosophy must unite together to destroy those who would stand against us.
trans-unit.target: 时间即将到来，我们这些拥有相同哲学的文明必须联合起来，消灭那些反对我们的人。

trans-unit.source: Soon, {LEADERNAME:2}, the galaxy will unite one way or the other.
trans-unit.target: 不久，{LEADERNAME:2}，银河系将以某种方式统一。

trans-unit.source: We are pleased with the ideological path you have chosen thus far. Benevolence is the path of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: 我们对你迄今为止选择的思想道路感到满意。仁慈是义人的道路。

trans-unit.source: Resisting the temptation of evil is not always easy. But it will help us all build a better galaxy.
trans-unit.target: 抵抗邪恶的诱惑并非总是容易。但它将帮助我们共同构建一个更美好的银河。

trans-unit.source: The universe is dark enough without adding to it, {LEADERNAME:2}. We are pleased with the path you have taken so far.
trans-unit.target: 宇宙已经足够黑暗，{LEADERNAME:2}，无需你再增添黑暗。我们对你至今走过的道路感到满意。
